children.value:
Name Seal Buy Sell Phrase Info
Level Lock Bracelet - 3000 1500 - Protects against level down effects.
Pierce Bracelet - 4000 2000 ICHIRO Thrown items pierce through walls and monsters.
Dragon Tile Bracelet 中 - Thrown items will always miss. Daisangen equipment ingredient.
No Control Bracelet - - Thrown items fly in a random direction.
Salty Bracelet - 5000 2500 - Protects against strength modifying slug licks and sheep spells.
Heal Bracelet - - Restores 5 HP per turn, but also doubles hunger rate.
Bend Bracelet - - Thrown items will curve when hitting walls.
Song Bracelet - - Protects against fullness loss by Hunger Puppet songs.
Breadcrumb Bracelet - - Makes you drop items randomly as you walk.
Strength Bracelet - 3400 - Increases strength by 3.
Bullseye Bracelet - 7500 3000 MAYHEW Thrown items will always hit their target.
Critical Bracelet - 1500 - Deal x5.0 damage critical hits, but shatters if you take damage.
Phantasm Bracelet - 10000 5000 - Lets you walk through walls and float over water.
Drains 5% HP per turn inside walls.
Scout Bracelet - ENDAR Reveals monster, item, and statue locations on the map.
Paper Thin Bracelet - 15000 7500 - Halves the accuracy of attacks and projectiles aimed at you.
Burns up if you take fire damage.
Parry Bracelet - - Redirects damage from physical attacks to a nearby monster.
No Hunger Bracelet - KUFUKU Stops natural fullness depletion.
Hunger Bracelet - - Doubles hunger rate.
Trapper Bracelet - 25000 1000 - Can pick up and set traps, and monsters will trigger them.
Found on the floor inside the dungeon.
Sold as merchandise inside a dungeon shop.
Found on the floor inside a Golden Interval.
Obtained from a treasure chest in a Golden Interval.
Nullifies level down effects such as
Protects against the level down effects of Twisty Hani's dance and Gazelle Pope spells.
Doesn't prevent level down effects from eating or getting hit by grasses.

Small Valley - Hidden Hole -
Shuten Easy - Halfway Well -
Shuten Mid - Sealed Room -
Shuten Hard - Road to the End Floor
Onigashima Floor, Presto
and objects in a similar fashion to
Thrown items will fly forever, passing through walls and monsters.
Be careful not to accidentally throw important items while it's equipped.
Useful for clearing out a Monster House from outside the room or lines of monsters in hallways,
but can cause accidents if the thrown item or projectile hits a Shopkeeper.

Small Valley - Hidden Hole -
Shuten Easy Presto Halfway Well -
Shuten Mid Presto, Trader Sealed Room Presto
Shuten Hard Floor, Presto, Trader Road to the End Floor, Presto, Surprise, Shop, Trader
Onigashima Floor, Presto, Surprise, Shop, Trader
Shot or thrown items will never hit
Thrown items will always miss their target, including throwing items at Mixer monsters.
Can be used to activate traps if a monster is standing on one.
Provides a 中 seal which is needed for synthesizing Daisangen equipment.

Small Valley - Hidden Hole -
Shuten Easy - Halfway Well -
Shuten Mid - Sealed Room -
Shuten Hard - Road to the End Shop
Onigashima Shop, Trader
Thrown items will fly in a random
Thrown items will fly in a random direction.
There's no practical use for it, but it can be sold for a decent amount.
Ally Shihan will always fling this bracelet in dungeons where bracelets normally do not appear.

Small Valley - Hidden Hole -
Shuten Easy - Halfway Well -
Shuten Mid - Sealed Room -
Shuten Hard - Road to the End Floor, Shop
Onigashima -
Protects against strength lowering Slug licks and Sheep Priest spells.
It doesn't protect against strength loss from poisons, such as poison arrows and Scorpion stings.

per turn, but also doubles hunger
Restores 5 HP per turn, but also doubles hunger rate.

Thrown items will curve when hitting walls or corners.

the location of items and monsters.

Shuten Mid - Sealed Room Golden
Shuten Hard - Road to the End Shop
Onigashima Presto, Shop
Redirects damage from physical attacks to a nearby monster.
If there are no other monsters nearby, you'll take damage as normal.
The attacking monster will level up if it defeats another monster due to this effect.
Bracelets will still take damage when successfully redirecting attacks.
Asuka will not redirect attacks when she has this bracelet equipped.

Small Valley - Hidden Hole -
Shuten Easy - Halfway Well -
Shuten Mid - Sealed Room Golden
Shuten Hard - Road to the End Shop
Onigashima -
depletion by letting you survive on
Stops hunger. No negative side effects.
Doesn't prevent HP loss if your fullness is already at 0%.
It only stops natural hunger depletion, so Hunger Puppet songs will still lower fullness.

Small Valley - Hidden Hole -
Shuten Easy - Halfway Well -
Shuten Mid - Sealed Room -
Shuten Hard Treasure Road to the End Shop

There's no practical use for it, but it can be sold for a large sum of Gitan.

Shuten Easy - Halfway Well -
Shuten Mid - Sealed Room -
Shuten Hard - Road to the End Shop
Onigashima -
Lets you pick up and set traps.
Once set, traps can't be picked up.
Lets you pick up and set traps, and monsters that step on traps will trigger them.
Cracks more easily than other bracelets. (See durability values for details)
Note that defeating a Trader using traps triggers thief mode.
Pair it with a Scout Bracelet to display all traps on the current floor on the map.
It's not mentioned in the description, but modifiers that lower attack and exp gain
are applied like inside the "Halfway Well" dungeon while it's equipped.

Small Valley - Hidden Hole -
Shuten Easy - Halfway Well Floor
Shuten Mid - Sealed Room -
Shuten Hard - Road to the End -
Onigashima -
